purchase_history.title: The Imitation Game DVD
purchase_history.description: Based on the real-life story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing, The Imitation Game portrays the intense race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers during the darkest days of World War II.

purchase_history.title: The Imitation Game: Alan Turing Decoded - Paperback
purchase_history.description: An official biography of legendary codebreaker Alan Turing, revealing his path from a brilliant mathematician to the pioneering mind behind modern computing.

purchase_history.title: World War II British Bletchley Park Coffee Mug
purchase_history.description: Celebrate the history of Bletchley Park, the iconic site of secret codebreaking, with this coffee mug. Perfect for history enthusiasts and fans of The Imitation Game.
